errorMessages.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. We'll bring you to the login page in a moment.
errorMessages.somethingWentWrongSorryAboutThat: Something went wrong, sorry about that. If this continues, please let us know.

files.fileSizeExceeded: The file size must be smaller than 5MB

formLabels.aboutPlaceholder: Share what you care about with others.

formValidationMessages.aboutProfessionalCharactorLimit: About has a maximum limit of 250 characters
formValidationMessages.youMustHaveAValidEmailAddress: You must have a valid email address

helperInformationBoxes.collaborativeTimelineAlt: Person pointing to a chart with some information on it
helperInformationBoxes.collaborativeTimelineText: Get project insights and provide feedback, all in one place.
helperInformationBoxes.homePageEmptyStateAlt: Whiteboard with two people working in front of it
helperInformationBoxes.homePageEmptyStateText: When you have a minute, post your update or idea to your project. Getting feedback and keeping people updated is important.
helperInformationBoxes.inviteProfessionalToOrganizationAlt: Arrow pointing to the invite professional form
helperInformationBoxes.organizationRegisterAlt: Arrows pointing to the register an organization form
helperInformationBoxes.organizationRegisterText: This is how your projects, teams, and everything else are organized. You'll probably have only one here, unless you have a lot going on.
helperInformationBoxes.professionalOnboardingAlt: Three buildings in a row of various sizes
helperInformationBoxes.professionalOnboardingText: Let's create your organization, first project and invite your coworkers. It will take about a minutes, promise.
helperInformationBoxes.professionalShareLinkRegistrationAlt: Two people standing, holding a large red circle with two link symbols about to connect.
helperInformationBoxes.professionalShareLinkRegistrationText: You are lucky enough to be invited by someone who values you. Be sure to pay it forward.
helperInformationBoxes.projectListEmptyStateAlt: Arrow pointing up and to the right, turning slightly left.
helperInformationBoxes.projectListEmptyStateText: Share a decision, idea or project update. Get feedback and keep everything together.
helperInformationBoxes.projectslistImageAlt: Professionals collaborating on a project together
helperInformationBoxes.projectslistText: Creating a new project provides you with a platform to share decisions, receive feedback, and demonstrate progress.
helperInformationBoxes.projectStartNewImageAlt: Arrow pointing to the start a new project form
helperInformationBoxes.projectText: Projects provides you with a platform to share decisions, receive feedback, and demonstrate progress.
helperInformationBoxes.peopleAlt: Two people holding pieces of a project
helperInformationBoxes.peopleHeader: Invite your coworkers into your organization
helperInformationBoxes.peopleText: Receive feedback and keep those you care about up to date on all your projects.

loginPage.errorSingleOrgJoinLimit: Only 1 email can be associated with a cleaved account.
loginPage.signInMessage: Create a new account, or log in to an existing one.

notFound.pageMessage: Oops, looks like we took a wrong turn! Use the menu at the top to try again.

organizations.areYouSureRemoveButtonText: I understand the risk, leave organization
organizations.areYouSureRemoveMeFromOrganizationDetail: If you remove yourself from this organization, you will not have access to the organization any more. If you are the last member to leave the organization, the organization and all data will be deleted.
organizations.areYouSureRemoveMeFromOrganizationTitle: Be careful, this is not reversable

people.addNewUserHelperText: It's always better with more people.
people.areYouSureRemoveMemberModalText: If you remove this user from your organization, they will not be able to access any of your projects again. Just remember, you can always invite tehm back.
people.peopleListHelperInfoText: As people interact with this project, they will appear in this list.

post.areYouSureDiscardPostModalText: We don't keep drafts yet, so your content will be lost.
post.areYouSureRemovePostModalText: If you delete this post, it will be gone forever. No turning back.
post.notContainOnlyBlankSpaces: This field can not be empty

postFileUpload.errorFileExceedsFileSize: One file exceeded {{fileSize}}mb in size and was not uploaded.
postFileUpload.errorFileIncorrectType: One file is not an accepted file type.
postFileUpload.errorTooManyFilesType: Too many files. The upload limit is {{maxFileUploadlimit}}
postFileUpload.dragDropAreaHelperText: Drag and drop up to {{imageUploadLimit}} images, or click to select.

professionalOnboarding.alreadyHasOrganizationText: I already have an organization I am a part of.
professionalOnboarding.finishOnboarding: Take me to my new project
professionalOnboarding.registerOrganizationCelebrateImageAlt: Two people high-fiving with fireworks around them
professionalOnboarding.registerOrganizationHelperInfoText: Organizations are how your projects, teams, and everything else are organized.
professionalOnboarding.startNewProjectCelebrateImageAlt: Two people jumping and high-fiving with fireworks around them
professionalOnboarding.startNewProjectHelperInfoImageAlt: Whiteboard with two people working in front of it
professionalOnboarding.startNewProjectHelperInfoText: Projects provides you with a platform to share decisions, receive feedback, and demonstrate progress.
professionalOnboarding.invitePeopleHelperInfoImageAlt: Two people holding project cards with a plus sign between them
professionalOnboarding.invitePeopleHelperInfoText: Invite your coworkers to come join you on all your projects.
professionalOnboarding.mailtoLinkEmailBodyText: I just joined Cleaved and set up a new project. Come join me.

professionalOnboardingHasOrganization.hasOrganizationHeader: Reach out to your admin to be invited
professionalOnboardingHasOrganization.hasOrganizationGetInviteImageAlt: Man and woman holding pieces of mail. Text that reads: Get invited
professionalOnboardingHasOrganization.hasOrganizationMessage: If your company already uses our service, you are lucky to work there. ðŸ™‚ Ask your admin to invite you.
professionalOnboardingHasOrganization.goBackToOnboardingText: I made a mistake and want to

professionalShareLinkRegistration.header: We're so glad someone invited you!
professionalShareLinkRegistration.shareLinkText: We believe in you and want you to be successful.

projectForm.addNewProjectHelperText: It's a great feeling when you start something new.

shareLinks.adminDescription: Gives the user access to manage people, account and billing information.
shareLinks.areYouSureRemoveSharelinkModalText: If you delete this share link, it will be gone forever. No turning back.
shareLinks.createReadShareLink: Create a read only share link
shareLinks.createWriteShareLink: Create a read and write share link
shareLinks.createWriteShareLinkText: Create a share link that will allow your coworkers to create projects and give feedback.
shareLinks.readOnlyDescription: Gives the user access to only view project content.
shareLinks.readWriteOnlyDescription: Gives the user access to create, view and interact with project content.

termsOfService.acceptTermsImageAlt: Picture about accepting terms and conditions
termsOfService.acceptTermsText: First things first, you need to accept the terms, then you can get down to business.

widget.projectsListEmptyListText: Awe shucks, no project yet. Let's go create one!
